0.0.1.name: wordpress/permalinks-for-hierarchical-custom-post-types
0.0.1.description:
This plugin allows you to create custom permalinks with hierarchical post types.

For example, you have two custom post types (book & author). You specify a structure with a slug of "library" that looks like example.com/library/%author%/%book%/
